title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 635/89 of 13 March 1989 making the importation into Spain of certain textile products originating in Taiwan subject to quantitative limits
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 635/89
of 13 March 1989
making the importation into Spain of certain textile products originating in Taiwan subject to quantitative limits
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The importation into Spain of certain textile fabrics (category 100), originating in Taiwan, shall be subject to the quantitative limits indicated in the Annex.
The provisions of Regulation (EEC) No 4134/86, and in particular those concerning the administration of quantitative limits, shall apply to the quantitative limits established by this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 March 1989.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 386, 31. 12. 1986, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 293, 27. 10. 1988, p. 58.
(3) OJ No L 124, 8. 6. 1970, p. 1.
ANNEX
